thread.title: Thirty years later, Blue Jays will search for redemption in déjà vu series
thread.title_full: Thirty years later, Blue Jays will search for redemption in déjà vu series

author: RACHEL BRADY
title: Thirty years later, Blue Jays will search for redemption in déjà vu series
text:
Baseball After being called out on a safe play in 1985, Blue Jays’ George Bell would later imply to media that the umps had a bias against the Canadian team: ‘If our club was American, we’d have it won by now.’ After being called out on a safe play in 1985, Blue Jays’ George Bell would later imply to media that the umps had a bias against the Canadian team: ‘If our club was American, we’d have it won by now.’ Thirty years later, Blue Jays will search for redemption in déjà vu series Add to ... TORONTO — The Globe and Mail 
Published Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 10:13PM EDT 
Last updated
